common.name: Name
info.appInformation.description:
As a leading Swiss Provider of digital identity and certificates solutions, Procivis AG supports government authorities and companies in the provision and usage of trusted online services for digital societies.

Founded in 2017, Procivis is a subsidiary of Orell FÃ¼ssli and benefits from its many years of experience in the field of security printing of physical identification documents.

info.clearCacheScreen.description: Clear your app cache to force the latest credential updates to be visible.
info.createBackup.dashboard.description: Securely backup your credentials and wallet with just a few taps. Your data is encrypted and protected by your chosen password.

info.createBackup.dashboard.title: Secure your data effortlessly.
info.createBackup.preview.description: The following credentials will be backed up. There are some credentials that are not possible to be backed up and when recovered will be invalidated.
info.createBackup.setPassword.descriptio: Your backup password will enable you to encrypt and decrypt your all your backups and enable you to securely recover your personal data.

info.onboarding.security.biometry: You are using biometric protection on your device? Consider activating it for this app and avoid entering the PIN code.
info.onboarding.security.subtitle: We use a six digit PIN code to protect the contents of your wallet and ensure that only you can use it.

info.restoreBackup.dashboard.description:
Welcome to the restoration guide for your digital wallet! If you need to revert your wallet to a previous state, this guide will walk you through the process of restoring it from a backup.

Please follow these steps carefully to ensure a successful restoration. Remember, restoring from a backup might replace your current data, potentially leading to the loss of any credentials or changes made after the backup was created.
Proceed with caution.
info.restoreBackup.import.description: Please select your backup file to continue.
info.restoreBackup.preview.description: You have successfully unlocked your backup and are able to reset your app to this version. You can now reset your wallet to this backup version.
info.restoreBackup.recoveryPassword.desc: Please enter the password to unlock your backup.
